question: Gandhi Mandapam where Gandhiji's ashes were placed before immersion is situated in which of the following places?
explanation: Mahatma Gandhi Memorial, also known as Gandhi Mandapam was built in the honour of Mahatma Gandhi, the father of our nation. After his demise in 1948, his ashes were kept in 12 different urns so as to transfer them to different parts of the country. One of these urns was brought to Kanyakumari and was immersed in the sea waters at Kanyakumari. Later Gandhi Mandapam was built at the same place.
